title: Edinburgh/East
name: Portobello
directions: From Duddingston Village walk along Duddingston Road West, turn left into the Figgate park and follow the Figgate Burn, about 2.5km. Take the bus 42 from the city center and get off at ''Portobello Town Hall'' - takes about 35 min
content: A traditional British beach resort within the city on the shore of the Firth of Forth. Golden sand, ice-cream parlours, fish'n'chips, amusement arcades, playgrounds, paddling pools, what more do you want from the seaside? Admittedly the weather is often more suited to ''Bracing Walks'' than ''Cooling Dips'' but there's still fun to be had in "Porty".
